import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function UpdateJournal() { const initial={ title:'', country:'', map_link:'', from_date:'', to_date:'', text:'', } const currId=useParams() const [form,setForm]=useState(initial); const handleChange=(e)=>{ setForm({...form,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } return (






) }
